    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83488</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Air resistance that slows down the shuttle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftwiderstand, der den Doppelventilkegel 
verlangsamt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résistance d'air qui ralentit la navette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resistência do ar que retarda abaixo o shuttle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Resistenza dell'aria che rallenta la spola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίσταση αέρα που επιβραδύνει τη σαϊ'τα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resistencia del aire que retrasa la lanzadera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the opposite direction of air resistance from the parachute with the movement of shuttle slows down the shuttle.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">opposite direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parachute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shuttles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die entgegengesetzte 
Richtung des Luftwiderstandes vom Fallschirm mit der Bewegung des 
Doppelventilkegels den Doppelventilkegel verlangsamt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la direction 
opposée de la résistance d'air du parachute avec le mouvement de la 
navette ralentit la navette.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o sentido oposto da 
resistência do ar do pára-quedas com o movimento do shuttle retarda 
abaixo o shuttle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il senso opposto 
di resistenza dell'aria dai paracadute con il movimento della spola 
rallenta la spola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η αντίθετη κατεύθυνση 
της αντίστασης αέρα από το αλεξίπτωτο με τη μετακίνηση της 
σαϊ'τας επιβραδύνει τη σαϊ'τα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la dirección 
opuesta de la resistencia del aire del paracaídas con el movimiento 
de la lanzadera retrasa la lanzadera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftwiderstand</string>
          </keyword>
